Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: The student can draw two people attempting to communicate over a long distance, showing the intent behind the device.
The student can accurately depict a string telephone with cups connected by a string.
The student can label basic parts of the device, such as the cups and string, with some occasional minor omissions.
The student can demonstrate in the drawing that the string is stretched between the two cups to show its function in communication.
The student can illustrate, possibly with arrows, how sound travels through the string from one person to the other.
CANNOT: The student may inconsistently label all materials used, sometimes omitting or mislabeling one of the materials *(e.g., forgets to label the string)*.
The student might not completely visually represent how this device fully solves the problem of communicating over distance *(e.g., may not include detailed context of a long distance)*.
The student may sometimes leave illustrative cues incomplete, like missing some arrows or incorrectly placing them *(e.g., arrows pointing away from the cups)*.
